ImpactDetonatedHobLobber.name: Impact Detonated Hob-Lobber
ImpactDetonatedHobLobber.description: The Impact Detonated Hob-Lobber is for when you absolutely, positively need something to go boom the moment it hits. Engineered with the precision of a catapult and the subtlety of a sledgehammer, this bad boy explodes on contact, turning enemies into a fine mist of regret and shrapnel.
ImpactDetonatedHobLobber.effect: Explodes on impact, dealing explosive damage to all in a 10-foot radius.

additionalEffects.name: Explosive Impact
additionalEffects.description: Deals an additional 2d6 fire damage if the target is wearing metal armor.

additionalEffects.name: Shrapnel Spread
additionalEffects.description: Anyone within the blast radius must make a Dexterity save (DC 15) or take 4d6 piercing damage.

TimedFuseHobLobber.name: Timed Fuse Hob-Lobber
TimedFuseHobLobber.description: The Timed Fuse Hob-Lobber is perfect for the patient bomber who enjoys watching their enemies' brief moment of realization before everything goes up in flames. Set the timer, lob it, and enjoy the fireworks from a safe distance.
TimedFuseHobLobber.effect: Explodes after a set duration, dealing explosive damage in a 20-foot radius.

additionalEffects.name: Delayed Blast
additionalEffects.description: Can be set to explode up to 30 seconds after being thrown.

additionalEffects.name: Smoke Screen
additionalEffects.description: Creates a 10-foot radius smoke screen that provides partial cover (+2 AC) for 1d4 rounds.

additionalEffects.name: Shrapnel Spread
additionalEffects.description: Anyone within the blast radius must make a Dexterity save (DC 15) or take 4d6 piercing damage.

TimedFuseHobLobber.triggerMechanism: Timed Fuse (5 seconds by default, adjustable up to 30 seconds)

SolidStandardHobLobber.name: Solid Standard Hob-Lobber
SolidStandardHobLobber.description: For the traditionalist who believes that sometimes, simple is best. The Solid Standard Hob-Lobber delivers a powerful hit without the frills and explosions, making it ideal for those who prefer their projectiles solid and deadly.
SolidStandardHobLobber.effect: Delivers a solid impact capable of knocking back targets.

additionalEffects.name: Knockback
additionalEffects.description: Targets hit by this ammunition must make a Strength save (DC 14) or be knocked back 10 feet.

additionalEffects.name: Armor Piercing
additionalEffects.description: Ignores 2 points of target's armor rating.

StickyHobLobber.name: Sticky Hob-Lobber
StickyHobLobber.description: The Sticky Hob-Lobber is for the sneaky demolitions expert who enjoys watching their enemies struggle in vain before meeting a fiery end. This adhesive grenade clings to any surface, including unfortunate enemies, and ensures they can't shake off their imminent doom. Perfect for those 'sticky' situations where a little extra explosive persuasion is needed.
StickyHobLobber.effect: Adheres to any surface or creature, detonating after a short delay or upon remote detonation.

additionalEffects.name: Cling-On
additionalEffects.description: The Sticky Hob-Lobber adheres to any surface or creature it hits. Targets stuck with this explosive must make a Strength save (DC 16) to remove it before detonation.

additionalEffects.name: Remote Detonation
additionalEffects.description: The user can choose to detonate the Sticky Hob-Lobber remotely within 60 feet.

additionalEffects.name: Silent Timer
additionalEffects.description: Emits no sound during its delay period, giving enemies no hint of the impending explosion.

additionalEffects.name: Shrapnel Spread
additionalEffects.description: Anyone within the blast radius must make a Dexterity save (DC 15) or take 4d6 piercing damage.

StickyHobLobber.triggerMechanism: Adhesive (sticks on impact) with a 3-second delay or remote detonation
